reviews.review: 起码在过了这么多年之后，依然能够看见起源引擎带来的令人惊讶的画质和优化

It's pretty good. In my opinion, the sounds, and a lot of the textures, are better than CSGO's. All the weapon sounds in css are very crisp. The old school source feel is good too.

Yes.
Still a good game even if CSGO is its predicesor

everyone uses aimbot and wh but whatever

Counter-Strike: Source is a fantastic game. GunGAME is a fantastic Mode. If you need better ways to improve your AIM ,Twitch Shots, response time look no futher. While very few servers left gun game is one of the best ways to improve these key factors of skill in FPS. The game itself is still fantastic, and till this day I continue join GG server on CSS to train and keep in tip top shape setting me up to be the best at any fps shooter from Call Of Duty to Battlefield.

Joguei durante muitos anos anteriormente ao CS:GO, pois tinha um pc mais fraco.
Agora, anos depois, volto a jogar de vez em quando e me divirto muito, acho inclusive mais divertido que o GO, pois não tinha aquelas frescuras de patente e skins kkk.
